detailed_results.input: My mother Thetis tells me that there are two ways in which I [Achilles] may meet my end. If I stay here and fight, I shall not return alive but my name will live for ever:
detailed_results.reasoning: Coalition/agent is wrong (gold attributes the guarantee to Achilles, prediction to Thetis). The condition is weakened (gold requires stay_here && fight; prediction only fighting). The consequence is incomplete (gold includes die && name-lives; prediction omits die). Thus the expressed property changes.
